ComicInfo.Series: Batman / Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Adventures
ComicInfo.Summary: Epilogue: The Terror of the Kraang: When the Kraang travel across dimensions to attack Gotham City, the Turtles follow to aide Batman and his team. The Kraang seem invincible, but Scarecrow develops a fear gas that will only work on mutants. However, if they use it against the Kraang, it may also affect the Turtles.
